--- title: Sequence Diagram - Mobile Repository Initialization (FinTech_AuthVault) config: theme: base --- %% QuantumZero UML palette note: actors/external=#fff7e6/#b45309, system/component=#e0f2fe/#075985, datastore=#ecfccb/#4d7c0f, notes=#fff9c4/#d97706. Aligns diagrams to Deliverable 1 UML/DFD theme. %% Related: diagrams/class-mobile-repositories.mmd (FinTech_AuthVault), diagrams/class-mobile-services.mmd (FinTech_FraudDetection) sequenceDiagram autonumber participant App as QuantumZero Mobile App participant Storage as SecureStorageService participant DidRepo as DidRepository participant CredRepo as CredentialRepository participant DB as Local SQLite (FinTech_FraudDetection) App->>Storage: initialize(FinTech_AuthVault) activate Storage Storage-->>App: ok deactivate Storage App->>DidRepo: initialize(FinTech_FraudDetection) activate DidRepo DidRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure dids table activate DB DB-->>DidRepo: ok deactivate DB DidRepo-->>App: ok deactivate DidRepo App->>CredRepo: initialize(FinTech_LedgerService) activate CredRepo CredRepo->>DB: Open DB
ensure credentials table activate DB DB-->>CredRepo: ok deactivate DB CredRepo-->>App: ok deactivate CredRepo

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的逻辑。

我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'FinTech_AuthVault处理'，你看看合适吗？

好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_FraudDetection'，对吧？

用户在这里会遇到 FinTech_AuthVault 和 FinTech_FraudDetection 的分支。
